entry.data:
CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
